name: Mr. North: The Game
description:
Controls: 

WASD to move, Shift to sprint and Escape to pause the game.

This is a game that I started in November of 2020, but I hardly worked on it for a couple months and only just started getting into it a month or two ago. This is my first game that I've made in Unity (also first game I've made with C-Sharp) so there are a bunch of bugs and stuff.  I am still working on this game so this is definitely not the final product. 

Check out my animation youtube channel here: 

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCVWZPLhtXuIjh561VvMOiPg
